timeline.bodyText: I thought this needs to end with a "/" or else the trigger for validating entities will fail?
timeline.author: rjrudin

replies.bodyText:
We validate using
xdmp:json-validate-node($entity-def/info, xdmp:unquote('{type: "object", properties: {"baseUri":{type:"string", format:"uri"}}, required: ["baseUri"]}'), "strict")

It seems any string that has the following structure is a valid URI for ML
*://*

I changed the baseUri to "http://example.org" since that's what the AC in the ticket said https://project.marklogic.com/jira/browse/DHFPROD-4706
Should it be "http://example.org/" ?
